Authenticate with an API key in a cookie

Source: R/security_api_key.R
dot-security_api_key_cookie.Rd

Authenticate with an API key in a cookie

Usage

.security_api_key_cookie(req, ..., path)

Arguments

req

A httr2::request() object.

path

The path to the cookie.

Value

A httr2::request() object.
